sourcesContent:
ID EMAIL FIRSTNAME LASTNAME Action
{{item.id}} {{item.email}} {{item.first_name}} {{item.last_name}}  

User Registration Form


Id is required

Name is required

User Name is required

Email is required


  
import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { SharedService } from "./service/shared.service"; @Component({ selector: 'app-root', templateUrl: './app.component.html', styleUrls: ['./app.component.css'] }) export class AppComponent implements OnInit { title = 'smartypants'; userData:any =[]; td:any; empData:any=[]; postData: any; myForm: any; showData: boolean = false; editIndex: any; idNew: any; nameNew: any; userNew: any; emailNew: any; userId: any; showAddButtonFlag:boolean=true; showUpdateButtonFlag:boolean=false; constructor(private ser:SharedService){} ngOnInit(): void { this.getData1(); this.getData2(); this.sendData(); } getData1(){ this.ser.getBackData1().subscribe((res:any)=>{ this.userData = res; this.userData['data'].forEach((item:any)=> { this.empData.push(item); }) console.log(res); }) } getData2(){ this.ser.getBackData2().subscribe((res:any)=>{ this.userData = res; this.userData['data'].forEach((item:any)=> { this.empData.push(item); }) console.log("empData",this.empData); }) } onSubmitForm(frm:any){ console.log(frm.value); } addUser(frm:any) { console.log(frm.value); this.userData.push(frm.value); this.idNew=""; this.nameNew=""; this.userNew=""; this.emailNew=""; } sendData() { this.postData = { Id: this.myForm, Name: this.myForm, UserName: this.myForm, Email: this.myForm } this.ser.sendData(this.postData).subscribe( (res: any) => { // console.log(res); } ) } editUser(e: any) { // console.log(e); //print select to edit in console this.showAddButtonFlag=false; this.showUpdateButtonFlag=true; this.idNew = e.id this.nameNew = e.name this.userNew = e.username this.emailNew = e.email this.editIndex = this.userData.indexOf(e) } //Update updateUser(myForm1: any) { this.showAddButtonFlag=true; this.showUpdateButtonFlag=false; console.log(myForm1.value); let obj = { Id: this.myForm, Name: this.myForm, UsearName: this.myForm, Email: this.myForm, } // var userId = this.userData.id this.ser.updateData(this.userId, obj).subscribe( (res: any) => { console.log(res); this.idNew=""; this.nameNew=""; this.userNew=""; this.emailNew=""; this.empData.splice(this.editIndex, 1, myForm1.value); } ) } delData(x: any) { this.ser.delData(this.userId).subscribe( (res: any) => { console.log(res); this.empData.forEach((element: any) => { // console.log(element); if (x.name == element.name) { // console.log(dat); it prints deleted row in console this.empData.splice(this.empData.indexOf(x), 1) } }); } ) } }
